GeonamesSearch.description: Search for geographical locations by name using GeoNames database. Returns location details including GeoNames ID, country, population, and coordinates.

query.description: Location name to search for (e.g., 'Paris', 'Zurich', 'New York')

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

WikidataSearch.description: Search for entities in Wikidata by name. Returns entity details including Wikidata ID, label, description, and URL. Useful for finding people, places, organizations, concepts, etc.

query.description: Entity name to search for (e.g., 'Albert Einstein', 'Paris', 'Python programming language')

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return
